original_text: And on the other side Jordan by Jericho eastward, they assigned Bezer in the wilderness upon the plain out of the tribe of Reuben, and Ramoth in Gilead out of the tribe of Gad, and Golan in Bashan out of the tribe of Manasseh.
korean_text: 여리고 동쪽 요단 저쪽 르우벤 지파 중에서 평지 광야의 베셀과 갓 지파 중에서 길르앗 라못과 므낫세 지파 중에서 바산 골란을 구별하였으니

sentences.original_text: And on the other side Jordan by Jericho eastward,
they assigned Bezer in the wilderness upon the plain
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 평야의 광야에 있는 베셀을 지정했고,

sentences.original_text: out of the tribe of Reuben,
out of the tribe of Gad,
out of the tribe of Manasseh.
